QxtStdio Class Reference
[QxtCore module]

QIODevice and QxtPipe support for stdin and stdout. More... 

 #include <QxtStdio>

Inherits QxtPipe.

  • List of all members, including inherited members

Public Functions

  • QxtStdio ( QObject * parent = 0 )
  • virtual bool waitForReadyRead ( int msecs )
  • void waitForEOF ( )

Detailed Description

including readyRead() signal.
perfect as a counter part for QProcess or debug output into a QxtPipe chain

See also: QIODeviceQxtPipe
Note: when using this class, the buffers for stdin/stdout will be disabled, and NOT reenabled on destruction

Member Documentation

QxtStdio ( QObject * parent = 0 )

constructs a QxtStdio with the given parent




virtual bool waitForReadyRead ( int msecs )

will block forever regardless of the parameter. returns false on EOF




void waitForEOF ( )

Blocks until EOF is received.
